metadata.title: CVE-2020-0306 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: In LLVM, there is a possible ineffective stack cookie placement due tostack frame double reservation. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11AndroidID: A-139666480

criterions.comment: llvm-toolchain-11 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
